articles.description: Only five games remain in Big 12 play, Kansas does not lead the conference race and yet the No. 13 Jayhawks have the potential to ascend to a point they are a tough out as a high seed in the NCAA Tournament.
articles.headline: No. 13 Kansas hosts No. 20 WVU in Big 12 clash

articles.description: David Collette scored 16 of his 22 points after the break and Tyler Rawson added 15 points as Utah overcame a sluggish first half to rally for a 70-58 victory over Washington in a Pac-12 Conference game on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Collette leads Utah past Washington 70-58

images.caption: Nahziah Carter flies through the paint and a teammate for a huge throw down.
images.name: Carter leaps over teammate for putback dunk

articles.description: Amanze Egekeze scored 19 points and had 10 rebounds, Austin Luke also scored 19 and Belmont defeated Eastern Kentucky 84-73 on Thursday night to remain in a first-place tie with Murrray State in the Ohio Valley Conference.
articles.headline: Belmont beats Eastern Kentucky 84-73, remains tied for first

articles.description: Curtis Phillips Jr. scored a career-high 29 points with four 3-pointers, grabbed seven rebounds and had three steals to lead Tennessee Tech to an 86-80 win over Austin Peay on Thursday night to end a three-game skid.
articles.headline: Phillips scores 29, Tennessee Tech downs Austin Peay 86-80

articles.description: Fletcher Magee had 21 points to lead five players in double figures and Wofford cruised to an 84-69 victory over Western Carolina on Thursday night.
articles.headline: Wofford rolls to 84-69 win over Western Carolina

articles.description: USC's Jordan McLaughlin finds Chimezie Metu inside to give the Trojans the winning bucket over the Ducks.
articles.headline: Trojans win on alley-oop

images.caption: USC's Jordan McLaughlin finds Chimezie Metu inside to give the Trojans the winning bucket over the Ducks.
images.name: Trojans win on alley-oop
